question: Why did Md-Bin-Tughlak change his capital from Delhi to Hyderabad/Deogiri?
option1: Because he wanted to improve trade in Deccan
option2: Because he wanted to spread Islam in the Deccan
option3: Because he wanted to punish the people of Delhi
option4: Because he wanted to escape from Mongolian invasion
answer: Because he wanted to escape from Mongolian invasion
explanation: By the time people reached Daulatabad, Muhammad Bin Tughlaq changed his mind and decided to abandon the new capital and move to his old capital Delhi. It is believed that he wished to shift the capital as a safeguard measure from Mongol Invasion. The plan of shifting capital was completely failed.
